name: Dungeon Shooter 3310
description:
Controls:

  • MOVE - W, A, S, D
  • AIM - Arrow keys
  • SHOOT - Space
  • SHIELD - E
  • SPRINT - Shift (toggle)
    • When sprinting, you can't shoot and shield!

"The Tyrant King Nimrod has ruled over the land for over 1000 years.
War and Famine have ravaged the realm and many have suffered under his reign. Now it is up to you to slay the evil Monarch bringing peace and prosperity to all people."

by Streamfire and Katsuhira
